message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have the rest.  We can negotiate further if you'd like.
I'll give you a smaller share, but I'm willing to compromise. Let's meet in the middle.
Okay, I see you're not willing to budge much. I'll take 60% this time. Let's get this done.
